Hi,
I'm a graduate student from Wright State Univerisity in Dayton, Ohio 
a=
nd i'm having diffuculty on installing the most recent version of 
Cantera =
on Windows XP.  I followed the instruction given in the 
powerpoint file: c=
antera15-install, using the the cantera15.msi 
installer.  It seems that no=
ne of the files for Mixmaster are being 
installed.  When i run some of the=
 examples using Python it seems 
that these examples are working but there =
seems to be no graphical 
interface.  Also i want to use Matlab to run Cant=
era and none of the 
tutorial or examples file run.  Using the Matlab tutor=
ial tut2.m I 
get the following errors:
     
EDU=BB tut2
??? Invalid MEX-f=
ile

Error in =3D=3D> C:\MATLAB_SE_5.3
\toolbox\cantera\cantera\@XML_Node\X=
ML_Node.m
On line 10  =3D=3D>    x.id =3D ctmethods(10,15,0,src); % newxml(=
name)

Error in =3D=3D> C:\MATLAB_SE_5.3
\toolbox\cantera\cantera\@Solution=
\Solution.m
On line 30  =3D=3D> doc =3D XML_Node('doc',src);

Error in =3D=
=3D> C:\MATLAB_SE_5.3\toolbox\cantera\cantera\IdealGasMix.m
On line 39  =3D=
=3D>        s =3D Solution(a);

Error in =3D=3D> C:\MATLAB_SE_5.3\tutorials=
\MATLAB\tut2.m
On line 15  =3D=3D> gas =3D IdealGasMix('gri30.cti')

I have=
 the Student version of Matlab would that interfere with 
Cantera interfaci=
ng wiih Matlab?  Also do i need to have Microsoft 
Visual Studio or Compaq =
Visual Fortran to use Cantera and the 
Mixmaster?  
I have tried installing=
 Cantera using the Cantera1.5.1.zip using 
Microsoft Visual Studio with the=
 procedure shown in the readme file 
given in the folder but i get the same=
 problems as shown above.  Any 
help you could give me would be greatly app=
reciated.

Thank You,
Sean Henderson
